mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.name AS "name", a.dict_key AS "dictKey", a.description AS "description", a.default_value AS "defaultValue", a.default_level AS "defaultLevel", a.control_value AS "controlValue", a.control_desc AS "controlDesc", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_dict_meta( id, type, name, dict_key, description, default_value, default_level, control_value, control_desc, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{dictKey}, #{description}, #{defaultValue}, #{defaultLevel}, #{controlValue}, #{controlDesc}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_dict_meta SET type = #{type}, name = #{name}, dict_key = #{dictKey}, description = #{description}, default_value = #{defaultValue}, default_level = #{defaultLevel}, control_value = #{controlValue}, control_desc = #{controlDesc}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
